code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AdminLogin(_ref){let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(username==='admin'&&password==='4444'){localStorage.setItem('adminAuth','true');onLogin();navigate('/admin/dashboard');}else{setError('Invalid username or password');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"admin-login",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Admin Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Enter your credentials to access the admin panel"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"login-form",children:[error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-message",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter username",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter password",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"login-button",children:"Login"})]})]})})});}export default AdminLogin;
